mapper.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY USER.REQ_DTL_USER_SEQ) AS rowNum , USER.REQ_DTL_USER_SEQ AS reqDtlUserSeq , CMT.REQ_DTL_USER_CMT_SEQ AS reqDtlUserCmtSeq , REQ.REQ_SEQ AS reqSeq , REQ.REQ_NO AS reqNo , DTL.REQ_DTL_SEQ AS reqDtlSeq , DTL.REQ_DTL_NO AS reqDtlNo , USER.USER_SEQ AS userSeq , FN_GET_USER_NM(USER.USER_SEQ) AS userNm , USER.BUSI_ROLL_CD AS busiRollCd , FN_GET_CODE_NM('BUSI_ROLL_CD', USER.BUSI_ROLL_CD) AS busiRoll , USER.PROC_YMD AS procYmd , USER.PROC_HH AS procHh , USER.REQ_DTL_STAT_CD AS reqDtlStatCd , FN_GET_CODE_NM('REQ_DTL_STAT_CD', USER.REQ_DTL_STAT_CD) AS reqDtlStat , CMT.REQ_DTL_STD_YMD AS reqDtlStdYmd , CMT.REQ_DTL_STD_PART AS reqDtlStdPart , CMT.REQ_DTL_END_YMD AS reqDtlEndYmd , CMT.REQ_DTL_END_PART AS reqDtlEndPart , CMT.CMT AS cmt , CMT.MNG_MAIN_YN AS mngMainYn , DATE_FORMAT(USER.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , FN_GET_USER_NM(USER.REG_SEQ) AS regNm FROM TB_REQ REQ INNER JOIN TB_REQ_DTL DTL ON REQ.REQ_SEQ = DTL.REQ_SEQ INNER JOIN TB_REQ_DTL_USER USER ON DTL.REQ_DTL_SEQ = USER.REQ_DTL_SEQ INNER JOIN TB_REQ_DTL_USER_CMT CMT ON USER.REQ_DTL_USER_SEQ = CMT.REQ_DTL_USER_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.select: AND USER.REQ_DTL_SEQ = #{reqDtlSeq} ORDER BY USER.REQ_DTL_USER_SEQ DESC
